field.name: jquery-load
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: When enabled the module triggers the jQuery behaviour in Joomla 3 and loads an instance of the jQuery library in Joomla 2.5. You need to have jQuery loaded on the page once in your template so if you already have this then ensure this option is disabled. If using Joomla3 and your template or another extension has already called this behaviour this setting will have no effect.

field.name: css-load
field.label: Load CSS?
field.description: When enabled the module loads a small css file with the styling required for the module. If you want to cut down on css fiels loaded on your site then you can disable this option and copy the contents of the /mod_zenskills/css/zenskills.css file into your template.
